participant_1.background:
I'm a bit of a loner, but I love spending time with my family on special occasions.
My parents died when I was young, so my sister and I had to take care of each other.
i have traveled to europe and mexico.
I'm the son of lawyers and I can make fart noises with my armpits.
I need to figure out how to satisfy my hunger and continue teaching my students.

participant_2.background:
I'm interested in learning more about the natural world and how it can be used to create a more sustainable future for my family.
I spend my days reading about politics and economics, and trying to understand how the world works.
I love to jam out on my guitar.
I've had to deal with a lot of loss in my life, but I'm still here.
i don t drive.

content.text: Hey, how are you doing?
I'm doing well! Thanks for asking.
What do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy learning about the natural world and how it can be used to create a more sustainable future for our planet. I also love to play music and spend time with my family.
That's awesome! I'm glad you have so many interests. I love to travel and experience new cultures. I'm also a musician and I love spending time with my family.
That's great! I've been wanting to travel more, but I haven't had the chance yet. I'm sure it's a lot of fun.
It is! I've been to Europe and Mexico, and I've had a blast in both places.
Wow, that's amazing! I'd love to go to Europe someday.
You should! It's a beautiful place.
I'm sure it is. I've heard great things about it.
What kind of music do you play?
I play guitar and I sing. I love all kinds of music, but my favorite is probably rock and roll.
That's great! I love to play guitar too. I'm not as good as you, but I'm getting better.
We should jam sometime!
That would be fun!
Great! I'll bring my guitar.
Sounds good!
So, what do you do for work?
I'm a teacher. I teach elementary school.
That's great! I've always wanted to be a teacher.
It's a lot of fun! I love working with kids.
I'm sure it is. I've heard that it's a lot of work, but it's also very rewarding.
It is! It's the best job in the world.
I'm sure it is. I'm glad you like your job.
Thanks! I love it.
I'm glad to hear that.
